channel.title: DevilsScape V4
channel.description:
Going to start on a brand new server with a new base. rs2hd is getting very old and pretty buggy and boring. Going to go with RuneEscape v1.1.
Revision: 562/668
Progress will be shown throughout the thread.
Things done: Summoning Mining Nex Jad Blink Corporeal beast NPC combat Projectile clipping Location crystal system Teleport Interface More to be shown later..
Credits: Dragonkk Me Darkside1222
Pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3puzItl.png?1[/img]

item.title: DevilsScape V4
item.dc:creator: @Lucifer667 Lucifer667
item.description:
@Lucifer667 wrote:

[quote=“joshisfamous, post:2, topic:523436”]Good luck neo, looking forward to play this when its done :D[/quote]Thank you
-Finished removing all current RuneEscape dialogues and putting in my own dialogue system. There was nothing wrong with it, but it’s just easier for me. Also added a location crystal which lets you save any location of your choice and teleport there.
I will be posting more updates later today.

Read full topic
